about.title: About
about.text: March 2027 (date to be confirmed), the first edition of the Backyard Ultra Terrassa will start. Backyard Ultra Terrassa was born from the idea to contribute to charity and the Backyard community. Thanks to the fantastic terrain around the city of Terrassa, this course includes mid elevation gain and a shadowy terrain close to the Batzuca creek "Torrent de la Batzuca".

communication.title: Official Statement
communication.body:
Dear runners,

We are contacting you with a heavy heart and deep sadness to communicate a difficult but inevitable decision: we are forced to postpone the Backyard Ultra Terrassa until March 2027.

As you know, the epidemiological situation derived from African Swine Fever (ASF) in our area remains serious. Currently, Terrassa is within the high-risk zone and authorities have totally restricted activities in the natural environment to curb the spread of the virus.

The outlook is not favorable in the short term: no changes in restrictions are expected for the next two months, and 13 new positive cases were confirmed last week.

Due to force majeure, it is impossible for us to go ahead with the race in 2026. Until the last moment we kept hope, but out of respect for you and responsibility, we have decided to move the race to March 2027. We are convinced that by then the health situation will be fully resolved and we will be able to enjoy the Backyard as you deserve.

Given this change of dates, we will proceed as follows:

  • Full refund: In the coming weeks we will automatically refund the registration fee to all participants.
  • Runner support: If you have any questions or queries, you can contact us directly at backyardultraterrassa@gmail.com.

The organization feels deep frustration and sadness; we were really looking forward to seeing you run through Terrassa. However, we believe this is the most honest decision for everyone.

Thank you for your patience and support. We will meet again stronger in 2027.

The Backyard Ultra Terrassa Organization
